snippet.title: An ExSCOURGEon Through Space & Time! – Indie Game Trailer
snippet.description:
🔴 SUBSCRIBE TO MY CHANNEL! – https://bit.ly/2Evo6NW

Here's a trailer for my dumb indie game, "An ExSCOURGEon Through Space & Time!"

Admittedly, this trailer probably gives off the wrong kind of tone for the game, but I wanted an old-school PS1 sort of vibe to match the game's aesthetic and this is what I ended up with. Oh well! 

🛠 WATCH THE DEVLOG: https://youtu.be/xe4mCrZ8wbo
🕹 PLAY THE GAME: https://andrewdavidj.itch.io/scourge

🎵 MUSIC BY TRAVIS HULL: https://www.reverbnation.com/tronzzz

🖥 MY EQUIPMENT:
● Blue Yeti: https://amzn.to/3vUQDsc
● Mac mini 2020: https://amzn.to/3MAsNrn
● Canon EOS Rebel T100: https://amzn.to/3MBNMKm
● 27" LG 4K Monitor (x2): https://amzn.to/3CtH2cR
● Microphone Boom Arm: https://amzn.to/3hRxGyn
● Davinci Resolve Speed Editor: https://amzn.to/3HZjSw2
● Korg NanoKEY2: https://amzn.to/3sQMweh
● Dual Monitor Stand: https://amzn.to/34tYQIv

🛠 TOOLS I USE:
● Unity: https://bit.ly/3aIiY9S
● Jetbrains Rider: https://bit.ly/2ZFIma2
● Various Unity Assets: https://bit.ly/2ZIWVKa
● Music & SFX by Uppbeat: https://wn.nr/4zC8KN
● ProductionCrate: https://bit.ly/31YzLAx
● Davinci Resolve
● Adobe Photoshop

▶️ TOOLS I USE TO PLAN, MANAGE, AND GROW MY CHANNEL:
● TubeBuddy: https://bit.ly/gotubebuddy
● MorningFame: https://bit.ly/gomorningfame

–
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/andrewdavidj
🌭 About me: https://andrewdavid.net

💬 JOIN ME ON DISCORD
~ https://andrewdavid.club

🙏🏼 SUPPORT ME ON PATREON
~ https://www.patreon.com/andrewdavidj

#indiegame #gametrailer #itchio
